errors.fetch-version: TST:Unable to fetch latest release version from Github

header.pending-txs3: TST:Data you see may not be updated.

errors.no-connections: TST:No connections active, web client is not connected to any other nodes!
errors.no-backend1: TST:Cannot reach backend. Please refresh the page and/or seek help on our
errors.csrf: TST:Security vulnerability: CSRF is not working, please exit immediately.

buy.deposit-address: TST:Choose an address to generate a BTC deposit link for:
buy.deposit-location-desc: TST:Choose a wallet where you'd like us to deposit your Skycoin after we receive your Bitcoin.
buy.wallets-desc: TST:Each time a new wallet and address are selected, a new BTC address is generated. A single Skycoin address can have up to 5 BTC addresses assigned to it.
buy.send-desc: TST:Send Bitcoin to the address below. Once received, we will deposit the Skycoin to a new address in the wallet selected above at the current rate of {{ rate }} SKY/BTC.
buy.fraction-warning: TST:Only send multiple of the SKY/BTC rate! Skycoin is sent in whole number; fractional SKY is not sent!
buy.receive-desc: TST:After receiving your Bitcoin, we'll send you your Skycoin. It may take anywhere between 20 minutes and an hour to receive your SKY.
buy.otc-disabled: TST:Sorry, otc has currently been disabled!
buy.details: TST:You can buy Skycoins directly from your wallet using our Skycoin Teller service. The current rate is 0.0002 BTC per SKY. To buy SKY, request a BTC deposit address. Once you have a BTC deposit address, any BTC deposits will   automatically be added to your selected address.

wizard.wallet-desc: TST:If you don't have a wallet, use the generated seed to create a new one. If you already have a wallet, toggle over to "Load Wallet" and enter your seed.
wizard.encrypt-desc: TST:Increase security of your wallet by encrypting it. By entering a password below, your wallet will be encrypted. Only those with the password will be able access the wallet and remove funds.

confirm.title: TST:Safeguard your seed!
confirm.desc: TST:We want to make sure that you wrote down your seed and stored it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you WILL NOT be able to recover your wallet!

wallet.delete-confirmation2: TST:will be deleted. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover this wallet! Do you want to continue?
wallet.delete-confirmation-check: TST:Yeah, I want to delete the wallet.

new.seed-warning: TST:Remember this seed! Keep it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover your wallet!
new.encrypt-warning: TST:We suggest that you encrypt each one of your wallets with a password. If you forget your password, you can reset it with your seed. Make sure you have your seed saved somewhere safe before encrypting your wallet.

tx.none: TST:There are still no transactions to show

backup.seed-warning: TST:BACKUP YOUR SEED. ON PAPER. IN A SAFE PLACE. As long as you have your seed, you can recover your coins.
backup.desc:
TST:Use the table below to get seeds from your encrypted wallets.
To get seeds from unencrypted wallets, open the folder above, open the .wlt files in a text editor and recover the seeds.

pending-txs.none: TST:Currently there are no pending transactions

disclaimer.disclaimer-description: TST:By continuing, you understand the risks related to the use of cryptographic tokens & blockchain-based software, the Skycoin wallets, and the Skycoin cryptocurrency. You understand this this product is provided as-is, and agree to the Terms and Conditions governing the usage of this product.

disclaimer.disclaimer-desc: TST:IF YOU USE THIS WALLET YOU MAY LOSE COINS. TESTING PURPOSES ONLY.

wallet.address-without-seed: TST:trying to generate address without seed!
wallet.unknown-address: TST:trying to update the wallet with unknown address!
wallet.wallet-exists: TST:A wallet already exists with this seed
